column2: §M(ED:PT)§Y Dragons Departing§!

[Root.GetBestName] has dragons in [Root.GetHerHis] army, but they will only obey the orders of rulers who venerate them as part of their religion. If [Root.GetBestName] does NOT convert to a dragon-worshipping religion before this timer runs out, then §Rthe dragons will depart§!!
The Dragons Will Remain
I have resumed the righteous worship of our mighty Dragons, so they have agreed to continue to aid me with my military conquests.
The age of Dragons continues
The Dragons Have Departed

As the Dragons fly away, returning to their mysterious inaccessible eyries high in the mountains, I marvel at their immense power and grace. Finally, when they are nothing but specks in the distance, I turn away and continue with my realm's everyday affairs.
The age of Dragons has ended - the world belongs to mortals now!
The age of Dragons has ended - the world belongs to me now!
The Dragons Are Suspicious
The Dragons Are Offended
The Dragons Are Departing
The Dragons Are Departing (Fallback)

The Dragons in my army have noticed a lack of appropriate worship from myself and my regular troops.\n\nDue to their pride, they have not yet taken any overt action, but we cannot hide the situation from them for long.

The Dragons in my army are offended by the fact that we have ceased to worship their divine majesty.\n\nIf we do not rectify this insult, they will surely withdraw their support for our military endeavours!

The Dragons in my army are openly preparing to leave, because we have ceased to provide them with the worship they deserve.\n\nThey have declared one final ultimatum: convert within a month, or they will all depart.
(Fallback due to error.) The Dragons attached to our army are departing immediately, because we have ceased to worship their divine greatness.
Hide the situation for as long as we can
Respond with empty platitudes
